definition: to sip/to smack one's lips/to taste/to savor
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(dialect) to savor/to test the taste of/(fig.) to ponder upon/to mull over
to approve by nodding one's head and smacking one's lips (idiom)

sentences.english: He answered with a click of his tongue.
sentences.chinese: 他以咂舌做出了肯定的回答。

sentences.english: Moving a stool and sitting at a table, he enjoyed himself tasting the tea slowly, crossing his legs.
sentences.chinese: 就搬了個凳子坐在桌邊蹺着二郎腿慢慢品咂起來。

sentences.english: The second was the prohibitive cost of developing and deploying the technologies.
sentences.chinese: 第二個就是發展和應用新技術的令人咂舌的開支。

definition: (onom.) patter, splatter, click/to smack one's lips/to pull (on a pipe)
the corners of the mouth/the lips
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
sorption (generic term for absorption, adsorption, diffusion, precipitation etc)
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
